name: Xurkitree
flavorText:
One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra
Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate
from its entire body, according to witnesses.

previous.name: Pheromosa
previous.flavorText:
One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been
spotted running across the land at
terrific speeds.

next.name: Celesteela
next.flavorText:
It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses
observed it flying across the sky at high speed.
